QAPair.Question: Do you have information about How to take statins
QAPair.Answer: Statins are medicines that help lower the amount of cholesterol and other fats in your blood. Statins work by: Lowering LDL (bad) cholesterol , Raising HDL (good) cholesterol in your blood, Lowering triglycerides , another type of fat in your blood , Statins block how your liver makes cholesterol. Cholesterol can stick to the walls of your arteries and narrow or block them.
